lead_paragraph: Nigeria wants Royal Dutch Shell to reopen one of its main pipelines but the oil multinational is resisting, analysts say, for fear it could once again be bombed by militants.
snippet: Nigeria wants Royal Dutch Shell to reopen one of its main pipelines but the oil multinational is resisting, analysts say, for fear it could once again be bombed by militants....

headline.main: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
headline.print_headline: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
